segments.text: I see a woman standing by the sink, completely absorbed in polishing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost amusing how she seems to be in her own world, unaware of the chaos unfolding behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can hardly believe that water is spilling everywhere, forming a puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sight of that boy climbing on the stool sends a shiver down my spine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn’t he realize how unstable that stool is? It’s practically begging to tip over!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread as I watch him reach for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl standing there—her eager expression is both cute and concerning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they have any idea how close they are to trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her palm is open, waiting, almost like a promise for a cookie, oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside that window, the garden looks so peaceful, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
